text: Hello everyone :wave: Is there any chance to add alt tags for images globally? Typing it in every instance might be annoying. Thanks in advance!

Do you mean something like this:

alt="{{ widget.icon.alt }}"

?

Hi, thanks for the response :slightly_smiling_face:  I'm afraid that I meant a different case.

Actually, I was wondering if there is any place where you can bind alt tag with an image, not with particular instance of it.

Example:
You have an hero image that you use on 20 landing pages of your company. Of course we can fill the _Alt text_ field in the default _Image_ module, but we'll have to copy-paste it in each of 20 instances (and repeat it in case of any ammendment). I expected HubSpot to allow bind alt text with an image in _Files Manager_ but I'm afraid it's not possible. Any chances to do that? :wink:

Hey <@UPHA2AUEM> this is actually in our community forums, would you be able to add an vote to it here and then add your use case into the comments: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-ALT-Text-field-at-the-file-manager-level/idi-p/198803>
Ok, thanks, I've just voted :slightly_smiling_face: It's really weird that HubSpot doesn't allow it by default but let's see what future will bring to us :smile:
